annotations.description: Midori is making a triumphant return to respectable drinking culture! For many years it was relegated to the night club circuit being slopped together with b...
annotations.title: Three Ingredient Midori Sour

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Midori
1oz (30ml) Lime Juice
Egg White

Shake and pour into footed rocks glass

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hkbxZ_d0OoM
title: Midori Sour
